natal_chart.title: Birth Chart
natal_chart.calculating: Your cosmic map is being decoded...
natal_chart.planets_description: Each planet represents an archetype, an inner voice within you. The Sun represents your essence, the Moon your emotional nature, Mercury your mind, Venus your love language, Mars your will. The outer planets show generational energies and deep transformation potential.
natal_chart.houses_description: The twelve houses represent twelve sacred areas of life. Each house is like a temple - with its own rituals, lessons, and treasures.
natal_chart.aspects_description: Aspects show how different energies within you relate to each other. Trines indicate natural talents, squares show growth opportunities, oppositions point to polarizations that need balancing.
natal_chart.retrograde_description: Retrograde planets turn that planet's energy inward. During these periods, it's beneficial to direct that energy toward inner motivation.

numerology.title: What do numbers tell you?
numerology.destiny_number_desc: Calculated from the total value of your name, this number reveals your main purpose and potential in life.
numerology.shadow_side_footer: These aspects can be transformed with awareness. Accepting the shadow is not empowering it - it is integrating it.
numerology.karmic_debt_message: Your chart has {debts} karmic debt. Tap for details.
numerology.ancient_secret_desc: Numerology is an ancient wisdom where the universe speaks in a mathematical language. From Pythagoras to Kabbalah, all esoteric traditions knew the power of numbers. Your birth date and name carry the vibration your soul brought into this world. Each number is a frequency, an energy, a destiny. What you see here is not coincidence - it is the code of your soul.
numerology.kadim_content: Since Pythagoras, sages have known that numbers carry the hidden language of the universe. Your life path number is not just a digit - it is the vibration your soul brought into this world, the unique melody the universe gave you. To hear this melody, you first need silence.
numerology.karmic_13_desc: A karmic debt arising from laziness and irresponsibility. Must be balanced through hard work and discipline in this life.
numerology.karmic_14_desc: A debt from misusing freedom. Learning responsibility and moderation is required in this life.
numerology.karmic_16_desc: A debt from ego and relationship issues. Requires humility and inner transformation.
numerology.karmic_19_desc: A debt from misusing power and authority. Learning the balance of independence and helping others is required.
numerology.karmic_default_desc: This number carries a karmic debt and requires certain lessons to be learned in this life.

reiki.title: Reiki
reiki.subtitle: Universal Life Energy
reiki.description: Reiki means 'universal life energy' in Japanese. This energy flowing through the hands activates the body's natural healing mechanisms and dissolves energy blocks. It provides stress reduction, relaxation, and holistic healing.

kyo_dake_wa.description: Focus on the present moment. The past is gone, the future hasn't come yet. You can only control today.

ikaru_na.description: Anger depletes your energy and harms your health. Accept your emotions but let them go.

shinpai_suna.description: Worry is giving energy to things that haven't happened. Live with trust and surrender.

kansha_shite.description: Gratitude is one of the highest vibrations. Find a blessing in everything.

gyo_wo_hageme.description: Whatever work you do, do it with integrity and dedication. Add meaning to your life.

hito_ni_shinsetsu_ni.description: Compassion and kindness are universal healing energies. Be kind to everyone, including yourself.

heart.name: Heart Chakra
heart.reiki_position: Place hands on center of chest

throat.name: Throat Chakra
throat.reiki_position: Place hands on either side of throat

crown.name: Crown Chakra
crown.reiki_position: Place hands on top of head

self_reiki.title: Self-Reiki Practice
steps: Sit or lie in a comfortable position
Close your eyes and take several deep breaths
Set your intention: "I open myself to healing energy"
Place hands on top of your head (3-5 min)
Place hands over your eyes (3-5 min)
Place hands on your throat (3-5 min)
Place hands on your heart (3-5 min)
Place hands on solar plexus (3-5 min)
Place hands below navel (3-5 min)
Finish with gratitude

daily_cleansing.title: Daily Energy Cleansing
steps: Rub your hands together when you wake up
Feel your hands warming and energy flowing
Cleanse your energy field by moving hands around your aura
Release negative energy into the ground
Start the day with positive intentions

distance_reiki.title: Distance Reiki
steps: Get permission from the person you'll send healing to (mentally)
Visualize the person or situation
Draw the Hon Sha Ze Sho Nen symbol (if applicable)
Send love and healing intention
Feel the energy reaching them
Finish with gratitude

reiki.tip: Working with a Reiki master is recommended for Reiki attunement. These practices can help develop energy awareness even if you haven't been attuned.

houses.title: Astrological Houses
houses.subtitle: 12 astrological houses and life areas
houses.section_subtitle: Discover different areas of your life
houses.view_house_on_chart: View This House on My Chart

1.title: 1st House - House of Self
1.description: Represents your personality, physical appearance and how you present yourself to the world. The rising sign rules this house.

2.title: 2nd House - House of Money & Values
2.description: Represents your material values, ability to earn money and self-worth.

3.title: 3rd House - House of Communication
3.description: Represents your thinking style, communication skills and relationships with your close environment.

4.title: 4th House - House of Family & Roots
4.description: Represents your family, home, emotional foundations and the later period of your life.

5.title: 5th House - House of Creativity & Love
5.description: Represents your creative expression, romance, children and sense of entertainment.

6.title: 6th House - House of Health & Service
6.description: Represents your daily routines, work habits and physical health.

7.title: 7th House - House of Marriage & Partnership
7.description: Represents your serious relationships, marriage and all types of partnerships.

8.title: 8th House - House of Transformation
8.description: Represents deep transformation, shared resources, sexuality and spiritual rebirth.

9.title: 9th House - House of Philosophy & Travel
9.description: Represents higher education, long journeys, philosophy and spiritual quest.

10.title: 10th House - House of Career & Status
10.description: Represents your career, social status, goals and achievements.

11.title: 11th House - House of Friends & Ideals
11.description: Represents your friendships, social groups, future hopes and ideals.

12.title: 12th House - House of Subconscious & Secrets
12.description: Represents your subconscious, hidden enemies, spiritual journey and karmic lessons.

houses.birth_time_required_desc: Accurate birth time is needed to calculate house positions
houses.no_planets_info: No planets in this house - this doesn't mean this area is inactive. The sign ruling this house and its ruler planet show how this area operates in your life.

1.title: Gate of Self
1.description: The first house is your soul's first touch to this world - the first breath, the first glance, the first sense of 'I'. This house is your 'cosmic mask'; it shows how your soul chooses to present itself to the world. {signName} here as rising colors your approach to life, your physical appearance and how others first perceive you.
1.shadow: Shadow aspect: Hiding behind the mask, placing excessive importance on appearance.
1.gift: Gift: The ability to experience every moment as a new beginning.

2.title: Temple of Values
2.description: The second house is the sacred temple of the material world. Money is not just paper - it's a reflection of your value system. {signName} positioned in this house shapes your earning style, what you value and your need for security. This house carries the spiritual dimension of the verb 'to possess'.
2.shadow: Shadow aspect: Seeking security only in material things, greed or excessive thriftiness.
2.gift: Gift: Developing abundance consciousness and using resources wisely.

3.title: Garden of the Mind
3.description: The third house is the sacred space of mind and communication. {signName} here determines your thinking style, speaking manner and way of learning. This house also governs relationships with siblings, neighbors and close environment. Here the mind becomes either a garden or a forest - the seeds you plant grow.
3.shadow: Shadow aspect: Superficiality, gossip, scattered attention.
3.gift: Gift: The power to unite worlds through words.

4.title: Root of the Soul
4.description: The fourth house is the deepest point of the chart - the root of your soul. {signName} here shapes family patterns, the need for emotional security and the concept of 'home'. This house carries the legacy of ancestors and the oldest impressions in your subconscious. You cannot understand where you're going without knowing where you came from.
4.shadow: Shadow aspect: Getting stuck in the past, blindly repeating family patterns.
4.gift: Gift: Deep emotional wisdom and capacity for inner peace.

5.title: Creator's Stage
5.description: The fifth house is the stage where your soul finds creative expression. {signName} here colors your creativity style, romantic expression, relationship with children and approach to 'play'. This house is where the joy of the heart springs forth - the home of the child within.
5.shadow: Shadow aspect: Ego inflation, attention addiction, risky behaviors.
5.gift: Gift: Pure creative energy and the ability to inspire others.

6.title: Workshop of Service
6.description: The sixth house is the home of daily life's sacred rituals. {signName} here determines work routines, health habits and approach to service. This house carries the answer to 'how do I serve?' Your body is a temple - the sixth house is its care manual.
6.shadow: Shadow aspect: Obsessive perfectionism, serving others while neglecting yourself.
6.gift: Gift: The capacity to create order and healing.

7.title: Beyond the Mirror
7.description: The seventh house is the mirror of the 'other' - the home of relationships, partnerships and marriage. {signName} here shapes the qualities you seek in partners, your relationship style and the concept of 'we'. Everyone who appears before you reflects something inside you - this house is that mirror.
7.shadow: Shadow aspect: Defining yourself through relationships, codependent relationships.
7.gift: Gift: Creating deep connections and seeing yourself in others.

8.title: Well of Transformation
8.description: The eighth house is the home of the death-rebirth cycle - the place of deepest transformations. {signName} here determines your coping style with crises, shared resources, sexuality and approach to mysteries. This house requires the courage to face shadows.
8.shadow: Shadow aspect: Control obsession, manipulation, fear of loss.
8.gift: Gift: The power to rise again from every pile of ashes like a phoenix.

9.title: Quest for Truth
9.description: The ninth house is the home of the search for meaning - philosophy, higher education, distant journeys and spiritual expansion. {signName} here shapes your belief system, teaching/learning style and way of seeing the 'big picture'. This house pursues the question 'why?'
9.shadow: Shadow aspect: Dogmatism, blind faith, inability to stay in place.
9.gift: Gift: Distilling wisdom from experience and enlightening others.

10.title: Crown of the Peak
10.description: The tenth house is the zenith of the chart - the home of career, social status and life mission. {signName} here determines the mark you want to leave in the world, your career style and relationship with authority figures. This house is the answer to 'who do I want to be in the world?'
10.shadow: Shadow aspect: Status obsession, workaholism, sacrifice for success.
10.gift: Gift: The capacity to leave a lasting and meaningful mark in the world.

11.title: Collective of Dreams
11.description: The eleventh house is the home of collective dreams, ideals and friendships. {signName} here shapes your social circle, group dynamics and vision for the future. This house is about finding your 'tribe' - what you cannot change alone, you transform together.
11.shadow: Shadow aspect: Losing individuality for group conformity, utopian dreams.
11.gift: Gift: Maintaining individual uniqueness while serving the collective good.

12.title: Gateway to Infinity
12.description: The twelfth house is the most mysterious corner of the chart - the home of the subconscious, spirituality, karma and dissolution. {signName} here carries subconscious patterns, your spiritual journey and 'letting go' lessons. This house is the gateway beyond ego, to infinity.
12.shadow: Shadow aspect: Tendency to escape, victim role, disconnection from reality.
12.gift: Gift: Boundless compassion and the experience of universal unity.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.zodiac_subtitle: Most frequently asked questions and answers
faq.birth_chart_subtitle: Everything you wonder about natal charts
faq.tarot_subtitle: What you need to know about tarot cards
faq.zodiac_a1: {sign} is one of the zodiac signs. Each sign has unique personality traits, strengths and weaknesses. Even if your Sun sign is {sign}, your rising sign and Moon sign also significantly influence your personality.
faq.zodiac_a2: Sign compatibility depends on the entire birth chart, not just Sun signs. Generally, signs in the same element group (fire, earth, air, water) tend to be more compatible. For detailed compatibility analysis, synastry (comparative chart) analysis is recommended.
faq.zodiac_a3: Daily horoscopes reflect general cosmic energies. Since each individual's birth chart is unique, personalized readings through birth chart analysis and transit reports provide more accurate results.
faq.zodiac_q4: What does it mean if my rising sign is {sign}?
faq.zodiac_a4: The rising sign (Ascendant) is the sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at your birth moment. It represents your outer appearance, how others perceive you, and your approach to life. You need to know your birth time to find your rising sign.
faq.birth_chart_a1: A birth chart (natal chart) is a cosmic map showing the positions of planets in the sky at the moment you were born. It shows which signs and houses the Sun, Moon and planets were in, and the aspects they make to each other.
faq.birth_chart_q2: What do I need to calculate a birth chart?
faq.birth_chart_a2: To calculate a birth chart, you need your birth date, birth time, and birth place. The more precise your birth time, the more accurately your rising sign and house placements can be calculated.
faq.birth_chart_q3: What if I don't know my birth time?
faq.birth_chart_a3: When birth time is unknown, noon (12:00) is typically used. In this case, the Moon sign and rising sign may be inaccurate. Planet sign placements and aspects between them will still be accurate.
faq.birth_chart_q4: What is the difference between house systems (Placidus, Whole Sign)?
faq.birth_chart_a4: Different house systems use different mathematical methods to divide the sky into 12 houses. Placidus is the most commonly used system. Whole Sign is an ancient system where each sign represents one house. Both systems are valid.
faq.tarot_q1: Do tarot cards show the future?
faq.tarot_a1: Tarot cards don't show a definite future, but rather your current energy field and possibilities. The cards work like a mirror - reflecting your subconscious and situation. The future is shaped by your decisions and actions.
faq.tarot_q2: How many cards are in a tarot deck?
faq.tarot_a2: A standard tarot deck consists of 78 cards: 22 Major Arcana (great secrets) and 56 Minor Arcana (lesser secrets). The Minor Arcana has four suits (Wands, Cups, Swords, Pentacles) with 14 cards each.
faq.tarot_a3: Reversed cards can indicate that the card's energy is blocked, internalized, or excessive. Some tarot readers don't use reversed cards, while others consider them an important nuance.
faq.tarot_q4: Can I read tarot for myself?
faq.tarot_a4: Yes, you can read tarot for yourself. The important thing is to set a clear intention and interpret the cards objectively. Daily card pulls are an excellent practice for self-discovery.
faq.numerology_a1: Numerology is an ancient wisdom system that studies the symbolic and spiritual meanings of numbers. It is believed that the numbers in your birth date and name provide information about your life path, personality, and potential.
faq.numerology_q2: How is the life path number calculated?
faq.numerology_a2: Your life path number is found by reducing all digits in your birth date to a single digit (or master numbers like 11, 22, 33). Example: 15.05.1990 = 1+5+0+5+1+9+9+0 = 30 = 3+0 = 3
faq.numerology_a3: Master numbers are powerful vibrations that carry special potential and challenges. 11 represents intuitive enlightenment, 22 the master builder, and 33 the master teacher. These numbers are not reduced to single digits.
faq.numerology_a4: Each letter has a numerical value (in the Pythagorean or Chaldean system). By adding up the numerical values of the letters in your name, your expression number, soul number, and personality number are calculated.

dreams.title: Dreams

canonical.losing_question: What does losing someone in a dream mean?
canonical.searching_question: What does searching for something in a dream mean?
canonical.past_question: What does someone from the past appearing in a dream mean?
canonical.flying_question: What does flying in a dream mean?
canonical.voiceless_question: What does being unable to speak in a dream mean?
canonical.darkness_question: What does a dark place in a dream mean?
canonical.unable_to_fly_question: What does being unable to fly in a dream mean?
canonical.lost_question: What does being lost in a dream mean?
canonical.running_question: What does running away in a dream mean?
canonical.falling_question: What does falling in a dream mean?
canonical.water_question: What does seeing water in a dream mean?

falling.short_answer_1: Falling dreams usually reflect a feeling of loss of control.
falling.short_answer_2: They appear when we feel like things are slipping away from us.
falling.short_answer_3: Waking up while falling is your subconscious's reflex to wake you.
falling.meaning_1: More common during times of uncertainty.
falling.meaning_2: You might be worried about work, relationships, or health.
falling.meaning_3: The speed of the fall shows the intensity of anxiety.
falling.recurring_2: Look at what makes you feel unstable in life.
falling.recurring_3: Accepting what you cannot control can bring relief.

water.short_answer_1: Water symbolizes the subconscious and emotions.
water.short_answer_2: The state of water reflects your inner world.
water.short_answer_3: Calm water shows peace, turbulent water shows turmoil.
water.state_title: What Does the Water's State Tell You?
water.state_1: Clear water: Mental clarity and emotional balance.
water.state_2: Murky water: Uncertainty or suppressed emotions.
water.state_3: Flowing water: Harmony with life's flow.
water.state_4: Still water: Time for introspection and reflection.
water.emotion_1: Swimming: Being at peace with emotions.
water.emotion_2: Falling into water: Emotions taking control.
water.recurring_1: You're trying to process an emotional issue.
water.recurring_2: There may be a need for inner cleansing.
water.recurring_3: You're learning to trust your intuition more.

flying.short_answer_1: Flying dreams reflect the desire for freedom and transcending limits.
flying.short_answer_2: Shows you've taken or want to take control.
flying.short_answer_3: The ease of flight symbolizes the flow in your life.
flying.feeling_1: Enjoyable flight: Confidence and sense of success.
flying.feeling_3: Fear of falling: Insecurity or doubt.
flying.meaning_1: Desire to break free from restrictions.
flying.cant_fly_1: You're struggling to believe in yourself.
flying.cant_fly_2: An obstacle is holding you back.
flying.cant_fly_3: It might be time to let go of control.

running.short_answer_1: Running dreams show the desire to escape from a situation or emotion.
running.short_answer_2: There might be something you're avoiding confronting.
running.short_answer_3: Being caught while running makes you feel escape isn't working.
running.meaning_1: There's a challenging situation in your life.
running.meaning_2: You might be running from responsibility or conflict.
running.meaning_3: What you're running from is usually within yourself.
running.from_1: From someone familiar: Unresolved issue with that person.
running.from_2: From a monster: Your own fears.
running.from_3: From vague danger: General state of anxiety.
running.recurring_1: There's a decision you've been putting off.
running.recurring_2: It might be time to face rather than run.
running.recurring_3: A dream where the escape ends shows the solution has begun.

lost.short_answer_1: Being lost reflects a feeling of losing direction and uncertainty.
lost.short_answer_2: Shows you don't know where life is taking you.
lost.short_answer_3: Could be a search for identity or purpose.
lost.where_1: City: Lost direction in social life.
lost.where_4: Familiar place: You're questioning what you know.
lost.meaning_1: You're struggling to make a decision.
lost.meaning_2: You feel you've lost control of your life.
lost.meaning_3: You're searching for who you are or what you want.
lost.find_2: Getting help: You're open to accepting support.

losing.short_answer_1: Losing someone dreams usually reflect fear of separation.
losing.short_answer_2: Doesn't have to be a real loss, it's a feeling of losing connection.
losing.short_answer_3: There may be unresolved feelings about that person.
losing.who_1: A loved one: Your attachment and fear of loss.
losing.who_2: A stranger: Your connection to yourself.
losing.who_3: A child: Innocence within or new beginnings.
losing.meaning_1: You might be experiencing fear of change.
losing.meaning_2: You feel distance in a relationship.
losing.recurring_1: Your fear of loss may have deepened.
losing.recurring_2: There's something you need to discuss with that person.
losing.recurring_3: You're seeking balance between independence and attachment.

past.short_answer_1: Someone from the past symbolizes unfinished feelings.
past.short_answer_2: It might be about that era, not that person.
past.short_answer_3: The subconscious is processing an old issue.
past.who_3: Someone who passed: Grief process or longing.
past.who_4: Someone from childhood: Past trauma or nostalgia.
past.meaning_1: The emotion you experienced then is still active.
past.meaning_2: A current situation may have triggered the past.
past.meaning_3: It may be time to forgive or let go.
past.recurring_1: You need to resolve something about that person.
past.recurring_2: The past is affecting the present.
past.recurring_3: Time to separate yourself from that era.

searching.short_answer_1: Searching dreams reflect feelings of lack or loss.
searching.short_answer_2: Shows you're chasing something in life.
searching.short_answer_3: What you're searching for explains what you need.
searching.what_1: An object: A lost trait or ability.
searching.what_2: A person: Need for connection or relationship.
searching.what_3: A place: Search for security or belonging.
searching.what_4: Vague: Search for direction in life.
searching.meaning_2: You're looking for answers but don't know where.
searching.meaning_3: You might be in a period of inner searching.
searching.not_found_1: There's something you're not ready for yet.
searching.not_found_2: What you're looking for might be within you.

darkness.short_answer_1: Darkness symbolizes the unknown and unexplored inner world.
darkness.short_answer_2: There may be emotions or thoughts you're not aware of.
darkness.short_answer_3: Can be read as an invitation to discovery, not fear.
darkness.action_title: What Did You Do in the Dark?
darkness.action_3: Were afraid: You're wary of the unknown.
darkness.action_4: Searched for light: Looking for clarity and meaning.
darkness.meaning_1: You're in an uncertain period in life.
darkness.meaning_2: There are parts of yourself you haven't met.
darkness.meaning_3: You're suppressing a secret or hidden emotion.
darkness.recurring_2: You're being invited on an inner journey.
darkness.recurring_3: Light comes after the darkness passes.

voiceless.short_answer_1: Being voiceless reflects feeling unable to express yourself.
voiceless.why_1: Voice didn't come out: Suppressed emotions.
voiceless.why_3: Screamed but nothing came out: Intense frustration.
voiceless.meaning_2: You can't express yourself on some matter.
voiceless.recurring_1: You're struggling to make your voice heard.
voiceless.recurring_3: There's someone you need to talk to.

unable_to_fly.short_answer_1: Being unable to fly reflects feeling you can't use your potential.
unable_to_fly.short_answer_2: You perceive an obstacle or limitation.
unable_to_fly.short_answer_3: You want freedom but something holds you back.
unable_to_fly.why_2: Fear: You're afraid of success or failure.
unable_to_fly.why_3: Falling: You feel a lack of confidence.
unable_to_fly.why_4: Physical obstacle: External conditions limiting you.
unable_to_fly.meaning_1: You're struggling to believe in yourself.
unable_to_fly.meaning_2: You have a fear of missing an opportunity.
unable_to_fly.meaning_3: You might need to let go of control.
unable_to_fly.recurring_2: Your inner critic is too strong.
unable_to_fly.recurring_3: To learn to fly, you must accept falling.

recurring.short_answer_1: Recurring dreams point to an unresolved issue.
recurring.short_answer_2: The subconscious is trying to get your attention.
recurring.short_answer_3: It repeats until the message is understood.
recurring.why_2: An ongoing source of stress in your life.
recurring.what_to_do_1: Note the dream, record the details.
recurring.what_to_do_3: Think about what in life it might connect to.
recurring.what_to_do_4: Try to consciously address the issue.
recurring.when_stops_2: When you take action on the related matter.
recurring.when_stops_3: When you release the emotional burden.

chakra.title: Chakra Analysis
chakra.energy_cycle_content: Chakras are not just energy centers, they are doors of consciousness. Each chakra is a bridge between the physical body and the spiritual body. Balancing them is the key not only to health but to inner awakening.

root.description: Muladhara - "Root Support" - symbolized as a 4-petaled red lotus. Located at the base of the spine, this chakra represents survival instincts, security, grounding, and your connection to the material world. It is associated with the Earth element. Ancestral energy is stored here. When balanced, you feel safe and stable.
root.emotional_aspects: Sense of security, stability, basic needs
root.balance_high: You have a strong foundation, you feel secure.
root.balance_low: You need grounding. Spend time in nature.
root.affirmation: I am safe. The universe protects and supports me.

sacral.description: The Sacral chakra is connected to creativity, emotions, sexuality, and the capacity for pleasure.
sacral.balance_high: Your creative energy is flowing, you are at peace with your emotions.
sacral.balance_low: You are having difficulty expressing your emotions.
sacral.balance_mid: Revitalize this energy with creative projects.
healing_suggestions: Dance or move your body freely
sacral.affirmation: My emotions flow freely. I embrace my creativity.

solar_plexus.description: The Solar Plexus chakra is related to personal power, self-confidence, willpower, and sense of identity.
solar_plexus.balance_high: You have a strong sense of self.
solar_plexus.balance_low: You need to rebuild your self-confidence.
solar_plexus.balance_mid: Strengthen by focusing on your goals.
healing_suggestions: Do exercises that strengthen the abdominal area
solar_plexus.affirmation: I am powerful. I have full control over my life.

heart.description: Anahata - "Unstruck Sound" - symbolized as a 12-petaled green lotus. The Heart chakra is the energy of love, compassion, forgiveness, and unconditional acceptance. It is the bridge connecting the physical and spiritual bodies. It is connected to the Air element. When balanced, you experience universal love and compassion for all beings.
heart.balance_high: Your heart is full of love, you are harmonious in your relationships.
heart.balance_low: Show compassion to yourself and others.
heart.balance_mid: Open your heart with forgiveness practices.
healing_suggestions: Spend quality time with loved ones
heart.affirmation: My heart is full of love. I am open to giving and receiving.

throat.description: The Throat chakra is related to communication, self-expression, truth, and creative voice.
throat.balance_low: You are having difficulty making your voice heard.
throat.affirmation: My voice is valuable. I share my truth with love.

third_eye.description: The Third Eye chakra is connected to intuition, inner vision, imagination, and spiritual awareness.
third_eye.balance_high: Your intuition is strong, you are in tune with your inner voice.
third_eye.balance_low: Learn to listen to your intuition.
third_eye.affirmation: I trust my intuition. My inner wisdom guides me.

crown.description: The Crown chakra is related to spiritual connection, enlightenment, universal consciousness, and life purpose.
crown.emotional_aspects: Spiritual connection, search for meaning, unity
crown.balance_high: You have a deep connection with the universe.
crown.balance_low: Strengthen your connection with spiritual practices.
crown.affirmation: I am one with the universe. I am open to divine guidance.

chakra.overall_analysis:
As a {sign}, your energy system is particularly strong in the {strongest} area. This means you have a natural talent in {emotional_aspects} matters.

However, paying more attention to your {weakest} area would be beneficial. You can add the recommended practices for this chakra to your daily routine.

Overall, your chakra system is working harmoniously. You can maintain this balance with regular meditation and awareness practices.
general_tips_list: Meditate for at least 10 minutes every day
Ground yourself by spending time in nature
Write your emotions in a journal

meditation_descriptions.grounding: Imagine roots extending from your feet into the earth. Feel safety and stability.
meditation_descriptions.heart_opening: Imagine a green light in your heart. With each breath, let this light grow.
meditation_descriptions.third_eye_activation: Focus on the point between your eyebrows. Imagine that you can see a purple light.

chakra.daily_description: Today, {chakra} energy is prominent. You can make your day more productive by doing activities aligned with this energy.

rising_sign.title: What is rising sign?
short_answer_bullets: Rising sign is the zodiac sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at the moment of birth.
It determines how the outside world sees you.
It is different from your Sun sign and requires birth time to calculate.
what_it_tells_bullets: Your first impression: What people feel when they first see you.
Your physical appearance: Affects facial features and body structure.
Your defense mechanism: How you behave in new situations.
Your approach to life: How you interact with the world.
difference_from_sun_bullets: Sun sign: Your essence, who you are.
Rising sign: Your mask, how you appear.
Moon sign: Your emotions, what you feel.
how_calculated_bullets: Rising sign changes approximately every 2 hours.
Cannot be calculated if birth time is unknown.
why_important_bullets: It determines all houses in the chart.
It affects which houses the planets fall into.
It positions life areas from career to relationships.

moon_sign_today.title: What sign is the Moon in today?
short_answer_bullets: The Moon changes signs approximately every 2.5 days.
Whatever sign the Moon is in today shapes your emotions.
The Moon sign determines the daily emotional tone.
why_important_bullets: Shapes your needs for nourishment and rest.
daily_life_bullets: When Moon is in a fire sign: Energy rises, impatience may occur.
When Moon is in an earth sign: Good for practical matters.
When Moon is in an air sign: Communication and socializing are highlighted.
When Moon is in a water sign: Emotional depth increases.

aura.title: Aura Analysis
aura.energy_body_description: Aura is the energy field surrounding your physical body. Every thought, emotion, and experience affects the color and intensity of your aura. Your birth date and name determine your primary aura color - this is your spiritual signature. Understanding your aura is the key to managing and protecting your energy.
aura.chakra_balance_info: Chakras are the energy centers in your body. Each one governs different areas of life.
aura.energy_body_secret: The Secret of Your Energy Body
aura.energy_body_secret_content: The concept of aura is based on thousands of years of esoteric tradition. Known as 'ka' in ancient Egypt, this energy body is called 'prana maya kosha' (life energy sheath) in Indian tradition. Modern Kirlian photography has confirmed this ancient wisdom, making visible the bioelectric field around living organisms.
aura.chakra_advice_root: Walk in nature, wear red. Grounding meditations and physical exercises strengthen this chakra.
aura.chakra_advice_sacral: Do creative activities, dance. Eat orange foods and stay close to water element.
aura.chakra_advice_solar: Spend time in sunlight. Do breathing exercises and tell yourself positive affirmations.
aura.chakra_advice_heart: Spend time with loved ones. Keep a gratitude journal and spend time in green spaces.
aura.chakra_advice_throat: Express your feelings, sing. Wear shades of blue and drink plenty of water.
aura.chakra_advice_third_eye: Meditate and record your dreams. Focus on purple/indigo colors.
aura.chakra_advice_crown: Spend time in silence, meditate. Wear white or purple and connect with nature.

kabbalah.title: Kabbalah
kabbalah.tree_of_life_secret: The Secret of the Tree of Life
kabbalah.tree_of_life_intro: Kabbalah is an ancient wisdom system that explains the structure of the universe and the soul. The Tree of Life (Etz Chaim) consists of ten Sefirot - each representing a different aspect of divine energy. Your name and birth date determine your place on this cosmic tree. This knowledge will guide you on your spiritual journey.
kabbalah.your_place_on_tree: Your Place on the Tree of Life
kabbalah.marked_red: Marked in red: Your Life Path Sefirah
kabbalah.marked_blue: Marked in blue: Your Name Sefirah

interpretation.name_intro: "{name}" carries the energy of {sefirah} with Gematria value {gematria}.
interpretation.sefirah_keter: Your soul is connected to infinity - you were born as a carrier of divine will. Your intuition is strong, your vision is vast.
interpretation.sefirah_chokhmah: You carry seeds of wisdom - sudden insights and inspirations are natural for you. A visionary soul.
interpretation.sefirah_binah: You have deep understanding capacity - you process concepts deeply and give them form. Analytical and intuitive.
interpretation.sefirah_chesed: Compassion and love are your nature - you carry healing, nurturing energy. Generosity is in your spirit.
interpretation.sefirah_gevurah: Your inner strength is powerful - discipline and determination are your weapons. Your sense of justice is sharp.
interpretation.sefirah_tiferet: You are at the balance point - you naturally create beauty and harmony. Heart-centered.
interpretation.sefirah_netzach: Perseverance and passion are your path - your creative energy is inexhaustible. You won't stop until you reach your goals.
interpretation.sefirah_hod: Your communication and analysis skills are strong - you express your thoughts clearly. Mental brilliance.
interpretation.sefirah_yesod: You have intuitive depth - dreams and symbols speak to you. Your astral connection is strong.
interpretation.sefirah_malkut: You are grounded and practical - you have the ability to turn ideas into reality. The world is your kingdom.
interpretation.balance_harmony: Your inner world and outer projection are in harmony - an authentic personality.
interpretation.balance_dynamic: There is an interesting dynamic between your inner and outer worlds - this tension carries growth potential.
interpretation.balance_mystery: Your deep inner world and the face you show are different - this mystery makes you powerful.

tree_interpretation.middle_pillar: You are on the Middle Pillar in the Tree of Life. The middle pillar is the path of balance - your task is to unite opposites and create harmony.
tree_interpretation.right_pillar: You are on the Right Pillar in the Tree of Life. The right pillar is the path of mercy and expansion - love, generosity, and creativity are your domain.
tree_interpretation.left_pillar: You are on the Left Pillar in the Tree of Life. The left pillar is the path of form and discipline - setting boundaries, analysis, and power are your domain.
tree_interpretation.same_sefirah: Your name and birth date point to the same Sefirah - you are very powerful in this energy!
tree_interpretation.full_journey: The journey between {lifePath} and {namePath} encompasses the entire Tree of Life - you are experiencing a deep spiritual evolution.
tree_interpretation.unique_signature: {lifePath} is your birth energy, {namePath} is the vibration that comes with your name - these two together create a unique spiritual signature.
tree_interpretation.single_sefirah: The energy of {lifePath} represents the main lesson you need to learn in this life.

saturn_return.title: Saturn Return
saturn_return.subtitle: The Great Teacher's Cosmic Lessons
saturn_return.kadim_content: Saturn, known as the Lord of Karma in astrology, demands discipline, responsibility, and maturity with each return. Approximately every 29.5 years, this cosmic teacher tests your foundations, destroys structures that don't serve your authentic self, and guides you toward building lasting achievements. The challenges are real, but so are the rewards for those who do the inner work.
saturn_return.in_return: You are in your Saturn Return

info.wisdom_quote: Saturn is the cosmic teacher. During its returns, it confronts us with our limits, responsibilities, and true selves.

active_messages.first: In this transition to adulthood, you are defining your career and life direction. This period may be challenging but will strengthen you.
active_messages.second: Transition to the second half of life. Your true priorities are becoming clearer, combining wisdom with experience.
active_messages.third: Time to review your legacy and life purpose. You are passing your wisdom to future generations.
active_messages.default: You are in an important life transformation.

interpretations.first: The First Saturn Return (ages 27-30) is the gateway to adulthood. During this time, you balance youthful dreams with reality. Important decisions about career, relationships, and life purpose are made. Saturn confronts you with your limits and helps you reveal your true potential.
interpretations.second: The Second Saturn Return (ages 57-60) is the transition to life's second half. During this time, you understand what truly matters. There is a shift from career peak to sharing wisdom. Physical and emotional health come to the fore.
interpretations.third: The Third Saturn Return (ages 87-90) is the time to evaluate your life legacy. Your wisdom and experiences are passed on to future generations. Spiritual maturity and inner peace are the gifts of this period.

cosmic_discovery.shadow_discovering: Your shadow self is being discovered...
cosmic_discovery.warning_suppress: Warning: Suppressing your shadow strengthens it. Accept it and transform it.

aries.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to impatience and anger control. As an Aries, your desire to move fast can sometimes lead you to impulsive decisions. Your shadow feeds on the fear of being left behind.
aries.details: Shadow Aries: Excessive competitiveness, not listening to others' opinions, 'I know best' attitude, unfinished projects due to impatience. Anger outbursts and then regret cycles.
aries.advice: To face your shadow: Wait 10 seconds before doing anything. Accept that others may be right too. Turn competition into cooperation.
aries.warning: Warning: Suppressing your shadow strengthens it. Accept it and transform it.

taurus.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to stubbornness and material dependency. As a Taurus, your search for security can sometimes make you resistant to change. Your shadow feeds on fear of loss.
taurus.details: Shadow Taurus: Excessive possessiveness, resistance to change, getting stuck in comfort zone, putting material security before emotional security. Tendency toward laziness and procrastination.
taurus.advice: To face your shadow: Start with small changes. 'What I have is not who I am' mantra. Sometimes loss is gain.
taurus.warning: Warning: Excessive search for security can disconnect you from life.

gemini.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to inconsistency and superficiality. As a Gemini, your curiosity can sometimes scatter you. Your shadow feeds on fear of depth.
gemini.details: Shadow Gemini: Not keeping promises, scattered attention, tendency to gossip, avoiding emotional depth. Creating perception of being two-faced.
gemini.advice: To face your shadow: Focus on one topic and go deep. Write down and follow through on your promises. Discover the power of silence.

cancer.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to excessive sensitivity and manipulation. As a Cancer, your protectiveness can sometimes be suffocating. Your shadow feeds on fear of rejection.
cancer.details: Shadow Cancer: Emotional manipulation, getting stuck in the past, passive aggressive behaviors, playing the 'victim' role. Excessive protectiveness and control.
cancer.advice: To face your shadow: Express your emotions directly. Let go of the past, live in the present. Set your loved ones free.
cancer.warning: Warning: Retreating into your shell doesn't solve problems, just delays them.

leo.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to ego and approval dependency. As a Leo, your desire to shine can sometimes overshadow others. Your shadow feeds on fear of being invisible.
leo.details: Shadow Leo: Excessive ego, constant expectation of attention, inability to handle criticism, jealousy of others' success. Tendency to create drama.
leo.advice: To face your shadow: Praise others and let them shine. Find your own value from internal sources. Practice humility.
leo.warning: Warning: External approval doesn't fill the internal void.

virgo.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to perfectionism and criticism. As a Virgo, your attention to detail can sometimes be paralyzing. Your shadow feeds on fear of inadequacy.
virgo.details: Shadow Virgo: Excessive criticism (of self and others), feeling that nothing is ever enough, anxiety and worry, 'paralysis by analysis'. Condescension toward others.
virgo.advice: To face your shadow: Learn the concept of 'good enough'. See mistakes as learning opportunities. Show compassion to yourself.
virgo.warning: Warning: The pursuit of perfection can result in doing nothing.

libra.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to indecisiveness and conflict avoidance. As a Libra, your search for harmony can sometimes distance you from your own needs. Your shadow feeds on fear of being alone.
libra.details: Shadow Libra: Trying to please everyone, inability to express own opinion, passive aggressiveness, superficial relationships. Letting others make your decisions.
libra.advice: To face your shadow: Learn to say 'no'. Defend your own opinion. Healthy conflict is inevitable and necessary.
libra.warning: Warning: Trying to make everyone happy makes you the most unhappy.

scorpio.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to control and revenge. As a Scorpio, your intensity can sometimes be toxic. Your shadow feeds on fear of losing power.
scorpio.details: Shadow Scorpio: Excessive jealousy and possessiveness, manipulation, thoughts of revenge, distrust. Obsession with secrecy and paranoia.
scorpio.advice: To face your shadow: Learn to let go of control. Discover the power of forgiveness. Open up to build trust.
scorpio.warning: Warning: Revenge burns you more than the other person.

sagittarius.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to irresponsibility and commitment avoidance. As a Sagittarius, your love of freedom can sometimes be escape. Your shadow feeds on fear of being trapped.
sagittarius.details: Shadow Sagittarius: Commitment phobia, escaping reality with excessive optimism, not keeping promises, avoiding responsibility. Thoughtless words.
sagittarius.advice: To face your shadow: Learn that freedom and commitment can coexist. Consider the impact of your words. Face instead of running.
sagittarius.warning: Warning: Constant escape results in belonging nowhere.

capricorn.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to workaholism and emotional distance. As a Capricorn, your ambition can sometimes distance you from humanity. Your shadow feeds on fear of failure.
capricorn.details: Shadow Capricorn: Workaholism, emotional coldness, status obsession, seeing others as tools. Pessimism and hopelessness.
capricorn.advice: To face your shadow: Create work-life balance. Express your emotions. Expand your definition of success.
capricorn.warning: Warning: When you reach the top, there may be no one beside you.

aquarius.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to emotional distance and superiority complex. As an Aquarius, your uniqueness can sometimes turn into loneliness. Your shadow feeds on fear of being ordinary.
aquarius.details: Shadow Aquarius: Emotional disconnection, 'I'm above everyone' attitude, lack of empathy, avoiding close relationships. Rebellious pose.
aquarius.advice: To face your shadow: Don't be different just to be different. Create emotional connection. Remember you're part of humanity.
aquarius.warning: Warning: Being above everyone means being with no one.

pisces.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to escape and victim mentality. As a Pisces, your sensitivity can sometimes disconnect you from reality. Your shadow feeds on fear of suffering.
pisces.details: Shadow Pisces: Addiction tendencies (substance, relationships, fantasy), victim role, inability to set boundaries, escape from reality. Being deceptive or being deceived.
pisces.advice: To face your shadow: Set healthy boundaries. Choose confrontation over escape. Separate dream from reality.
pisces.warning: Warning: Constant escape from reality leads to greater pain.

aries.main: {name}, your life purpose is to open new paths and lead with courage. As an Aries, you were born to be a pioneer.
aries.details: Your Life Mission: Teaching people courage, making new beginnings, inspiring to overcome fears. You are an igniter - you set stagnant energies in motion.
aries.advice: To live your purpose: Face your fears, take risks, give courage to others. Shine your best in leadership positions.

taurus.main: {name}, your life purpose is to create beauty and build secure foundations. As a Taurus, you were born to bring abundance.
taurus.details: Your Life Mission: Creating material and spiritual abundance, bringing beauty to the world, building safe spaces. You are a builder - you create lasting values.
taurus.advice: To live your purpose: Create beautiful things, produce value, make others feel secure. Shine your best by staying connected with nature.

gemini.main: {name}, your life purpose is to spread knowledge and build connections. As a Gemini, you were born for communication.
gemini.details: Your Life Mission: Sharing ideas, connecting people to each other, awakening curiosity. You are a messenger - you carry and transform information.
gemini.advice: To live your purpose: Learn and teach, build bridges, spread ideas. Shine your best in communication fields.

cancer.main: {name}, your life purpose is to nurture and provide emotional security. As a Cancer, you were born for compassion.
cancer.details: Your Life Mission: Giving emotional support, creating safe spaces, nurturing and healing. You are a caretaker - you heal souls.
cancer.advice: To live your purpose: Share your compassion, build home, protect others. Shine your best in caregiving roles.

leo.main: {name}, your life purpose is to shine and inspire others. As a Leo, you were born for creativity.
leo.details: Your Life Mission: Creative expression, inspiring, spreading generosity and joy. You are a sun - you illuminate those around you.
leo.advice: To live your purpose: Create, inspire, be generous. Shine your best in center stage and creative fields.

virgo.main: {name}, your life purpose is to serve and perfect. As a Virgo, you were born to heal.
virgo.details: Your Life Mission: Helping in practical ways, improving systems, bringing healing. You are a healer - you make everything better.
virgo.advice: To live your purpose: Serve, create order, offer healing. Shine your best in health and organization fields.

libra.main: {name}, your life purpose is to create balance and beauty. As a Libra, you were born for harmony.
libra.details: Your Life Mission: Providing justice, creating beauty, bringing peace. You are a mediator - you balance opposites.
libra.advice: To live your purpose: Build bridges, create beauty, provide justice. Shine your best in art and diplomacy fields.

scorpio.main: {name}, your life purpose is to transform and go deep. As a Scorpio, you were born for healing.
scorpio.details: Your Life Mission: Facilitating transformation, uncovering hidden truths, deep healing. You are an alchemist - you turn lead into gold.
scorpio.advice: To live your purpose: Dive deep, transform, offer healing. Shine your best in psychology and research fields.

sagittarius.main: {name}, your life purpose is to explore and share wisdom. As a Sagittarius, you were born to teach.
sagittarius.details: Your Life Mission: Expanding horizons, seeking and sharing wisdom, spreading the spirit of freedom. You are a teacher - you seek the meaning of life.
sagittarius.advice: To live your purpose: Explore, teach, inspire. Shine your best in education and travel fields.

capricorn.main: {name}, your life purpose is to build and leave a legacy. As a Capricorn, you were born to achieve.
capricorn.details: Your Life Mission: Building lasting structures, taking responsibility, leaving a legacy. You are an architect - you create works that last for generations.
capricorn.advice: To live your purpose: Set goals, build, leave a legacy. Shine your best in business and management fields.

aquarius.main: {name}, your life purpose is to bring innovation and serve humanity. As an Aquarius, you were born for revolution.
aquarius.details: Your Life Mission: Bringing new ideas, creating social change, shaping the future. You are a visionary - you see tomorrow today.
aquarius.advice: To live your purpose: Innovate, unite, change. Shine your best in technology and social fields.

pisces.main: {name}, your life purpose is to create spiritual connection and spread compassion. As a Pisces, you were born to heal.
pisces.details: Your Life Mission: Providing spiritual connection, expressing through art, spreading unconditional love. You are a mystic - you see the invisible.
pisces.advice: To live your purpose: Connect, create, offer healing. Shine your best in art and spiritual fields.

karma_lessons.main: {name}, as a {sign}, it's time to learn your karma lessons. The South Node represents past life habits, and Saturn represents your tests in this life. There are themes you need to work on in this life.
karma_lessons.details_template: Your karma lessons are determined based on your sign element and ruling planet. As a {element} element, you need to learn {lesson}.
karma_lessons.saturn_lessons: Saturn's house lessons: Responsibility and maturation
karma_lessons.chiron_wounds: Wounds shown by Chiron: Healing potential
karma_lessons.north_node: North Node: Your spiritual evolution direction
karma_lessons.karma_timeline_desc: Saturn return (around age 29) and Chiron return (around age 50) are major karma settlement periods.
karma_lessons.advice: Every challenge you face is a karma lesson. Recognize it, accept it, and transform it. Follow your transit chart to know active karma periods in advance.
karma_lessons.warning: Warning: If the same lessons keep coming to you, it means you haven't learned them yet. Face instead of running.
karma_lessons.fire_lesson: patience, humility, and thinking of others
karma_lessons.earth_lesson: letting go, trusting, and being open to change
karma_lessons.water_lesson: setting boundaries, realism, and emotional independence

soul_contract.main: {name}, before coming to this world, your soul made a contract. As a {sign}, your birth chart's North Node, Saturn, and 12th house carry traces of this contract.
soul_contract.contract_items: Main Articles of Your Soul Contract:
soul_contract.contract_intro: Your soul contract includes your life purpose, karma lessons, and basic experiences you'll encounter in this life. As a {sign}, you came to work on {theme}.
soul_contract.life_purpose: Life Purpose: The direction shown by the North Node
soul_contract.past_life_legacy: Past Life Legacy: South Node and 12th house
soul_contract.soul_connections_desc: Important people entering your life are also part of your soul contract. Moon Node connections in synastry charts show karmic soul bonds.
soul_contract.advice: To remember your soul contract: Meditate, pay attention to your dreams, observe recurring themes. The 12th house and Neptune position in your birth chart show doors to access your subconscious memory.
soul_contract.warning: The soul contract is not unchangeable. With your free will, you can make new choices at any moment.

inner_power.main: {name}, the power within you is greater than you realize. As a {sign}, you have unique superpowers.
inner_power.advice: To activate your inner power: Focus on your strengths, use them consciously, practice every day.

gemini.power3: Knowledge Repository - Knowledge on any topic

cancer.power3: Intuitive Guidance - Sensing the right path

virgo.power2: Problem Solving - Finding solutions to any problem

libra.power1: Harmony Creation - Adapting to any environment
libra.power3: Aesthetic Eye - Seeing and creating beauty

scorpio.power1: Transformation Power - Drawing strength from darkness
scorpio.power3: Rebirth - Rising stronger from every fall

aries.main: {name}, your flirt style is bold and direct! As an Aries, you don't hesitate to make the first move.
aries.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Direct approach
Your Charm Weapon: Courage and energy
Your Red Line: Playing games
What Attracts You: Challenge
Your Flirt Motto: 'No risk, no reward'
aries.advice: For flirting success: Slow down a bit, keep your mystery, but don't give up your courage.

taurus.main: {name}, your flirt style is sensual and patient! As a Taurus, you love romance.
taurus.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Slow and sensual approach
Your Charm Weapon: Sex appeal and reliability
Your Red Line: Rushing
What Attracts You: Beauty and quality
Your Flirt Motto: 'Patience is the key to everything'
taurus.advice: For flirting success: Use your senses, create romantic settings, don't rush.

gemini.main: {name}, your flirt style is witty and fun! As a Gemini, you seduce with conversation.
gemini.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Clever conversation
Your Charm Weapon: Wit and intelligence
Your Red Line: Boredom
What Attracts You: Intellectual stimulation
Your Flirt Motto: 'Anyone you can make laugh is yours'
gemini.advice: For flirting success: Balance talking, also listen, be a bit mysterious.

cancer.main: {name}, your flirt style is romantic and emotional! As a Cancer, you seduce with your heart.
cancer.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Building emotional connection
Your Charm Weapon: Compassion and care
Your Red Line: Emotionlessness
What Attracts You: Feeling of security
Your Flirt Motto: 'The way to the heart is through compassion'
cancer.advice: For flirting success: Keep your boundaries, don't attach too quickly, leave some mystery.

leo.main: {name}, your flirt style is showy and attractive! As a Leo, you take over the stage.
leo.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Getting attention
Your Charm Weapon: Charisma and confidence
Your Red Line: Being ignored
What Attracts You: Appreciation and admiration
Your Flirt Motto: 'Shine so they can find you'
leo.advice: For flirting success: Give your partner space to shine too, add humility.

virgo.main: {name}, your flirt style is subtle and thoughtful! As a Virgo, you impress with details.
virgo.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Helpfulness and attention
Your Charm Weapon: Intelligence and elegance
Your Red Line: Rudeness
What Attracts You: Cleanliness and order
Your Flirt Motto: 'The devil is in the details'
virgo.advice: For flirting success: Let go of perfectionism, be spontaneous, show yourself more.

libra.main: {name}, your flirt style is elegant and romantic! As a Libra, you're a natural charmer.
libra.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Charm and harmony
Your Charm Weapon: Beauty and diplomacy
Your Red Line: Rudeness and fighting
What Attracts You: Aesthetics and harmony
Your Flirt Motto: 'Beauty opens every door'
libra.advice: For flirting success: Find your own voice, don't say yes to everything, overcome indecisiveness.

scorpio.main: {name}, your flirt style is intense and magnetic! As a Scorpio, you hypnotize.
scorpio.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Deep gaze and mystery
Your Charm Weapon: Intensity and passion
Your Red Line: Superficiality
What Attracts You: Depth and loyalty
Your Flirt Motto: 'Seduce with your eyes'
scorpio.advice: For flirting success: Dose your intensity, add some lightness, build trust.

sagittarius.main: {name}, your flirt style is adventurous and fun! As a Sagittarius, you seduce with freedom.
sagittarius.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Adventure and fun
Your Charm Weapon: Optimism and spontaneity
Your Red Line: Boredom and restriction
What Attracts You: Free spirits
Your Flirt Motto: 'Life is an adventure, come explore together'
sagittarius.advice: For flirting success: Connect a bit more, keep your promises, exist beyond adventure too.

capricorn.main: {name}, your flirt style is serious and determined! As a Capricorn, you impress with reliability.
capricorn.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Serious intentions
Your Charm Weapon: Success and determination
Your Red Line: Irresponsibility
What Attracts You: Ambition and goals
Your Flirt Motto: 'Serious intentions bring serious relationships'
capricorn.advice: For flirting success: Relax a bit, make room for fun, show your emotions.

aquarius.main: {name}, your flirt style is different and unexpected! As an Aquarius, you attract with your uniqueness.
aquarius.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Friendship-based
Your Charm Weapon: Originality and intelligence
Your Red Line: Ordinariness
What Attracts You: Unique souls
Your Flirt Motto: 'Being normal is boring'
aquarius.advice: For flirting success: Reduce emotional distance, don't fear attachment.

pisces.main: {name}, your flirt style is romantic and dreamy! As a Pisces, you seduce with dreams.
pisces.details:
Your Flirt Tactic: Romance and imagination
Your Charm Weapon: Empathy and sensitivity
Your Red Line: Rudeness and coldness
What Attracts You: Romantic and artistic souls
Your Flirt Motto: 'Love is a dream, come see it together'
pisces.advice: For flirting success: Keep your feet on the ground, protect your boundaries, be realistic.

leadership_style.main: {name}, as a {sign}, your leadership style is unique and powerful.

types.aries: Pioneer Leader - Taking the first step, brave and fearless
types.taurus: Stable Leader - Reliable, patient, and determined
types.gemini: Communicator Leader - Spreading information, building connections
types.cancer: Protective Leader - Nurturing, protecting, like family
types.aquarius: Innovative Leader - Thinking differently, revolutionary, humanitarian

weaknesses.pisces: Lack of realism, inability to set boundaries

advice.aries: Learn to listen to others, involve the team
advice.taurus: Be open to change, try flexibility
advice.gemini: Focus on one topic, be consistent
advice.cancer: Learn to be objective, set professional boundaries
advice.leo: Give others the stage, listen to criticism
advice.virgo: See the big picture, let go of perfectionism
advice.libra: Decide and stand behind it, don't fear conflict
advice.scorpio: Learn to trust, let go of control
advice.sagittarius: Pay attention to details, keep your commitments
advice.capricorn: Invest in human relationships, be flexible
advice.aquarius: Create emotional connection, listen to the team

heartbreak.main: {name}, as a {sign}, your heartbreak experience is unique. Here are your heart wounds and the way to heal them.
heartbreak.warning: Warning: Ignoring your wounds makes them bigger. Feel your pain, but don't stay there.

triggers.aries: Being rejected, being put in second place
triggers.aquarius: Not being understood, being made ordinary

reactions.aries: Anger outburst, immediately turning to someone new
reactions.taurus: Shutting down, stubbornly holding on or completely cutting off
reactions.cancer: Retreating into shell, getting stuck in past
reactions.libra: Consulting everyone, indecisiveness, fear of loneliness
reactions.pisces: Depression, escape, taking refuge in fantasies

healing.cancer: Family and close friends, home comfort

advice.aries: Release your anger through sports, but don't rush into a new relationship
advice.taurus: Give yourself time, find comfort but don't shut down
advice.gemini: Talk but also feel emotions, don't run
advice.cancer: Get support but don't get stuck in the past
advice.leo: Love yourself, don't expect approval from others
advice.virgo: Stop blaming yourself, you don't have to be perfect
advice.libra: Make peace with loneliness, learn to be on your own
advice.scorpio: Let go of revenge, learn to forgive
advice.sagittarius: Face instead of running, feel the pain
advice.capricorn: Allow your emotions, not everything is work
advice.aquarius: Don't deny your emotions, attachment is not weakness
advice.pisces: Be realistic, don't escape to fantasies, protect your boundaries

soul_mate.main: {name}, here's everything you wonder about your soul mate as a {sign}.

descriptions.aries: Someone energetic, brave, who loves challenge. Will compete with you but also support you.
descriptions.taurus: Someone reliable, loyal, who loves beauty. Will build a comfortable home with you.
descriptions.gemini: Someone intelligent, talkative, curious. Will never bore you and match you intellectually.
descriptions.cancer: Someone compassionate, protective, family-oriented. Will share emotional depth with you.
descriptions.leo: Someone confident, generous, who appreciates you. Will share the stage with you.
descriptions.virgo: Someone smart, organized, helpful. Will build a perfect partnership with you.
descriptions.libra: Someone elegant, romantic, fair. Will have a harmonious and beautiful relationship with you.
descriptions.scorpio: Someone deep, passionate, loyal. Will build an intense and transformative bond with you.
descriptions.sagittarius: Someone adventurous, free-spirited, philosophical. Will explore the world with you.
descriptions.capricorn: Someone ambitious, reliable, goal-oriented. Will walk to success together with you.
descriptions.aquarius: Someone unique, independent, visionary. Will change the world with you.
descriptions.pisces: Someone romantic, intuitive, artistic. Will build a spiritual bond with you.

places.pisces: Art galleries, meditation centers, music events

advice.libra: Know your own worth, don't seek approval

tarot.title: Tarot
tarot.page_title: What do the cards tell you?
tarot.ancient_wisdom_intro: Tarot is a mirror of the subconscious. These cards do not show the future, but possibilities. Each draw reveals the current energy field and potential paths. Ask the cards a question or simply seek guidance. Trust your intuition - the answers are already within you.
tarot.kadim_note_content: Each Tarot card is an archetype of the collective unconscious. As Jung said, these symbols were born from humanity's shared dreams. When you draw a card, you start a dialogue with the universe. The answer is not in the card itself, but in the connection you make with it.

theta_healing.title: Theta Healing
theta_healing.subtitle: Subconscious Transformation Practice
theta_healing.intro_description: Theta Healing is a healing technique aimed at transforming subconscious beliefs and energy blocks in the theta brain wave state (4-7 Hz). This practice helps you discover limiting beliefs and create positive changes.

intro.theta_state_content: Theta brain waves (4-7 Hz) are active during deep meditation, dreaming, and moments of creativity. In this state, direct access to the subconscious is possible and profound changes can be made.
intro.limiting_beliefs_content: There are belief patterns formed in childhood that unconsciously affect our lives. With Theta Healing, you can identify and transform these beliefs.
intro.energy_transformation_content: Energy blocks at the physical, mental, and spiritual levels are resolved. The healing process begins at the cellular level and spreads throughout your entire being.
intro.seven_planes_content: Theta Healing works with the 7 planes of existence in the universe: Minerals, Plants, Animals, Humans, Spirits, Laws, and Creative Energy.

techniques.digging_description: You go deep into the subconscious to find the root cause of the limiting belief and discover the core belief.
techniques.digging_step_2: Go deeper with the question "Where does this belief come from?"
techniques.digging_step_4: Transform when you find the root belief
techniques.belief_change_description: The process of replacing a negative belief with a positive one.
techniques.belief_change_step_4: Ask the Creator for the change and witness it
techniques.feeling_download_description: A technique for teaching positive feelings you have never experienced at the cellular level.
techniques.feeling_download_step_1: Identify the missing feeling (e.g., feeling safe)
techniques.feeling_download_step_3: Ask what it feels like to know this feeling
techniques.feeling_download_step_4: Download the feeling into every cell
techniques.body_scan_description: Detecting energy blocks and sources of illness in your body.
techniques.body_scan_step_2: Scan the body from head to toe
techniques.body_scan_step_3: Note areas of energy density or deficiency

meditations.theta_transition_description: Safely transition to the theta brain wave state.
meditations.seventh_plane_description: Connect to creative energy and experience unconditional love.
meditations.inner_child_description: Heal childhood traumas with compassion and make peace with your inner child.
meditations.ancestor_clearing_description: Clear karmic patterns and genetic beliefs inherited from ancestors.
meditations.abundance_description: Remove abundance blocks and open the flow of prosperity.
meditations.soulmate_description: Clear relationship obstacles and attract your soulmate.

chart.cosmic_map_description: This chart is a snapshot of the sky at the moment you were born ‚Äî but it's so much more. It's a coded map of the potentials, lessons, and gifts your soul brought into this world. Each planet is an inner voice, each sign an energy pattern, each house a life domain. This chart doesn't limit you ‚Äî it reminds you of who you are.

synastry.kadim_content: In the dance of two souls, the stars reveal not just compatibility, but the deeper lessons each person brings to the other. Synastry is the ancient art of reading these cosmic conversations.

numerology.famous_people: Famous People with This Life Path
numerology.master_tip_11: As a Master 11, practice regular meditation and grounding to protect your high intuition and sensitivity. Protect yourself from energy vampires.
numerology.master_tip_22: As a Master 22, build your big visions step by step. Perfectionism can paralyze - embrace the principle that 'done is better than perfect'.
numerology.master_tip_33: As a Master 33, don't neglect yourself while healing others. Boundaries are not unkind - put on your own mask first.
numerology.shadow_transforms: Shadow transforms with awareness. Acceptance is integration.
numerology.life_path_bullets_1_1: Life path 1 carries leadership and independence energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_1_2: The pioneering soul is born for new beginnings.
numerology.life_path_bullets_1_3: Individuality and originality are core life themes.
numerology.life_path_bullets_2_1: Life path 2 carries balance and partnership energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_2_2: Diplomacy and harmony are natural talents.
numerology.life_path_bullets_2_3: Relationships and cooperation are central to life purpose.
numerology.life_path_bullets_3_1: Life path 3 carries creativity and expression energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_3_2: Natural talent exists in art and communication.
numerology.life_path_bullets_3_3: Spreading joy and inspiration is the spiritual mission.
numerology.life_path_bullets_4_1: Life path 4 carries order and stability energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_4_3: Discipline and diligence are core life themes.
numerology.life_path_bullets_5_1: Life path 5 carries freedom and change energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_5_2: Adventure and experience seeking is natural.
numerology.life_path_bullets_5_3: Flexibility and adaptability are strong points.
numerology.life_path_bullets_6_1: Life path 6 carries responsibility and love energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_6_2: Caring for family and community comes naturally.
numerology.life_path_bullets_6_3: Creating harmony and beauty is life purpose.
numerology.life_path_bullets_7_1: Life path 7 carries wisdom and introspection energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_7_2: Spiritual seeking and analysis are natural tendencies.
numerology.life_path_bullets_7_3: Deep meaning seeking is central to life.
numerology.life_path_bullets_8_1: Life path 8 carries power and abundance energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_8_2: High potential for material and spiritual success.
numerology.life_path_bullets_8_3: Leadership and management are natural talents.
numerology.life_path_bullets_9_1: Life path 9 carries humanity and completion energy.
numerology.life_path_bullets_9_2: Universal love and compassion are natural states.
numerology.life_path_bullets_9_3: Serving others is the spiritual mission.

daily_number.page_title: What does daily number energy tell you?
daily_number.short_answer_1: Daily number energy shows the numerological vibration of the day.
daily_number.short_answer_3: Reflects the overall energy and potential of the day.
daily_number.how_calculated_1: All digits of the date are added together.
daily_number.what_for_1: Helps you align with the energy of the day.
daily_number.what_for_3: Points to areas that need attention.
daily_number.important_note_2: Gains more personal meaning when combined with your personal number.
daily_number.important_note_3: It's an awareness tool, not an obligation.
daily_number.meaning_1: A day of beginnings and leadership
daily_number.meaning_2: A day of cooperation and balance
daily_number.meaning_3: A day of creativity and expression
daily_number.meaning_4: A day of structure and order
daily_number.meaning_5: A day of change and freedom
daily_number.meaning_6: A day of family and responsibility
daily_number.meaning_7: A day of introspection and analysis
daily_number.meaning_8: A day of abundance and power
daily_number.meaning_9: A day of completion and release
daily_number.meaning_11: A day of intuition and inspiration
daily_number.meaning_33: A day of healing and teaching

destiny_number_screen.short_answer_1: Destiny number is the numerological value calculated from your full name.
destiny_number_screen.short_answer_2: It shows what you came to achieve in this life.
destiny_number_screen.short_answer_3: It is also known as the expression number.
destiny_number_screen.how_calculated_1: Each letter in your full name is assigned a number value.
destiny_number_screen.how_calculated_2: A=1, B=2, C=3... and so on.
destiny_number_screen.how_calculated_3: All letter values are added and reduced to a single digit.
destiny_number_screen.what_it_tells_1: The energy you need to express in this life.
destiny_number_screen.what_it_tells_2: How to best use your potential.
destiny_number_screen.what_it_tells_3: What you came to contribute to the world.
destiny_number_screen.what_it_tells_4: The direction of your natural talents.
destiny_number_screen.difference_from_life_path_1: Life path: The road you walk.
destiny_number_screen.difference_from_life_path_2: Destiny number: The destination you want to reach.
destiny_number_screen.difference_from_life_path_3: Together they form the complete picture.
